name: quickbill
description: - Comment under an issue you want to be assigned to. - Create a New branch from `staging` with your name and the feature you are working on. for example   `yusufroqib/hero-section`. - Make sure you do a rebase or pull before making your pull request back to `staging`. - On your pull request, refrence the issue you worked on by mentioning the issue number or uurl you worked on.
